variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 1.00% on the portion of income up to $21,512. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 2.00% on the portion of income over $21,512 up to $50,998. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 4.00% on the portion of income over $50,998 up to $80,490. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 6.00% on the portion of income over $80,490 up to $111,732. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 8.00% on the portion of income over $111,732 up to $141,732. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 9.30% on the portion of income over $141,732 up to $721,318. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 10.30% on the portion of income over $721,318 up to $865,574. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 11.30% on the portion of income over $865,574 up to $1,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_9
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 9: 12.30% on the portion of income over $1,000,000 up to $1,442,628. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_10
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 10: 13.30% on the portion of income over $1,442,628. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_10 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all ten brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
